title: Is this APP legit?

replies.body: Doesn't sound familiar to me, so I'm not clicking it.  :X  In fact I'm editing it out!  We don't support third party or modifications, and you can't really know for sure if it's hiding malicious content inside.  Check out our [third party guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) and stay super cautious.  Better safe than sorry!
